definition: to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
to be classified as/to belong to/to be part of
